Zombies.name: Zombie
Zombies.description: A creature with pearly, milky skin and crazy diseased eyes stumbles toward you.

Zombies.name: Zombie
Zombies.description: A creature with pearly, milky skin and crazy diseased eyes stumbles toward you.

Zombies.name: Bag boy Zombie
Zombies.description: A bag boy hovers by a checkout kiosk drooling and staring at nothing. It's hard to tell if he's a zombie

Zombies.name: Ultimate Zombie Boss
Zombies.description: A powerful zombie, large from consuming others. You assume this was the initial zombie that began the plague. Patient Zero.

Zombies.name: Monkey Zombie
Zombies.description: Somehow a monkey got turned into a zombie?

Zombies.name: Teacher Zombie
Zombies.description: A teacher who must have been bitten by a zombie. It stumbles around the school halls with it's mouth gaping open.
